pullRequest.title: Remove USReceipt - Receipt design update FormRecognizer
pullRequest.bodyText:
Closes: #11681
Initially, Java only had FormField<T> and with the current direction, we only want to support FormField. So removing FormField<T> and adding FieldValue and making the design more consistent with .NET.

nodes.bodyText: Why are you adding a public FieldValue to deal with the new receipt changes?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,213 @@
+// Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

nodes.bodyText: How large can this Integer be? According to the service team, we'll eventually start supporting 64-bits integers here (not a concern for Preview 3, I think).
I think this extra space before @param was an accident...?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -40,14 +39,13 @@
 
     /**
      * Constructs a FormField object.
-     *
-     * @param confidence The confidence of the recognized field.
+     *  @param confidence The confidence of the recognized field.
      * @param labelText The label text value for the field.

@@ -1,6 +1,9 @@
 # Release History
 
 ## 1.0.0-beta.3 (Unreleased)
+- Removed `USReceipt` and `USReceiptItem`.
+- Removed the extension class `ReceiptExtensions` that transformed the recognized receipt to `USReceipt`. 
+- Removed `ReceiptType` and the `receiptType` property from `RecognizedReceipt`.
